div.head: Description of changes for 2012.09
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft copied from a descriptive transcription of the St. Victor manuscript. A transription of the Sorbonne witness still needs to be added. After a comparision of manuscript witnesses, corrections and additions will be made. Citations, cross-references, and a critical apparatus all still await constructions.
